rolloverSecuredLine(address,address,addr.details: borrower must call rollover() on `oldLine` with newly created line address

params.oldLine: - line to copy config from for new line.
params.ttl: - set total term length of line

returns._0: newLine - address of newly deployed line with oldLine config

rolloverSecuredLine(address,address,addr.notice: sets up new line based of config of old line. Old line does not need to have REPAID status for this call to succeed.
